Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Should I be calling you Chrome or Smith, Cap?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Chro... no, call me whatever you want. I decide to what, and to whom, I respond.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Relaxed by Kamui's laughter, Chrome laughs too."}
{3: 'The riot of laughter sounds surprisingly crisp.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'I live in an incredible world... surrounded by incredible people.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strike Hawk Members', 3: "Hey, Chrome, we're heading outside."}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'You guys, you never intended to wait for my command, did you?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strike Hawk Members', 3: "Time is of the essence. Can't afford to wait for the official go-ahead. Kamui taught us that."}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Leave me out of it! Hey, Wanshi, say something!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Oh... uh, well, I just want to go home and hit the sack, so...'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "If you're going to slack off, at least be discreet about it...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strike Hawk Members', 3: 'So what about you, Leader? Are you staying behind to work on that weird report system? Or are you coming with us?'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Now that you mention it, I'm gonna start tinkering with this weird system, and you guys will wait for me to finish.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Even so. Despite so. What Langston went through and what Strike Hawk managed to piece togetherâ€”'}
